scripts.dev: VITE_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) VITE_APP_PORT=$(port) SIGNAL_SRV_PORT=$(port) BOOT_SRV_PORT=$(port) UI_PORT=8888 npm run x
scripts.x: hc s clean &&  npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run start:happ" "hc run-local-services -b $BOOT_SRV_PORT -s $SIGNAL_SRV_PORT"
scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=8888 concurrently "npm start -w ui" "npm run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests
scripts.launch:happ: echo "pass" | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/emergence.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network -b "http://127.0.0.1:BOOT_SRV_PORT"  webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_SRV_PORT"
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package -w ui && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting with admin $VITE_ADMIN_PORT  & s=$SIGNAL_SRV_PORT b=$BOOT_SRV_PORT" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$VITE_ADMIN_PORT --piped generate workdir/emergence.happ --run=$VITE_APP_PORT -a emergence network -b "http://127.0.0.1:$BOOT_SRV_PORT"  webrtc "ws://127.0.0.1:$SIGNAL_SRV_PORT"
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
